LanguageData.OwlBar.ShowRoles.Desc: Controls whether or not you want ideology role icons, such as leader or specialist, to show in the pawn portrait. This feature was added because normally icons represent temporarily effects, but the DLC deviates from this by including more permanent ones.
LanguageData.OwlBar.ShowHunger.Desc: Controls whether or not you want a hunger icon to show on a pawn's portrait. This can be useful when you are controlling drafted pawns for an extended period of time.
LanguageData.OwlBar.ShowHungerIfDrafted: ...but only show hunger icon if drafted
LanguageData.OwlBar.ShowHungerIfDrafted.Desc: The hunger icon will only be shown if drafted.
LanguageData.OwlBar.ShowTired.Desc: Controls whether or not you want a tired icon to show on a pawn's portrait. This can be useful when you are controlling drafted pawns for an extended period of time.
LanguageData.OwlBar.ShowTiredIfDrafted: ...but only show tired icon if drafted
LanguageData.OwlBar.ShowTiredIfDrafted.Desc: The tired icon will only be shown if drafted.
LanguageData.OwlBar.MoodBackgrounds.Desc: Enabling this will make the background color of the pawn portraits represent mood.
LanguageData.OwlBar.RelationshipAltMode.Desc: If alt mode is enabled, relationships in the colonis bar are only shown if you click the same pawn a second time.
LanguageData.OwlBar.RelationshipView.Tooltip:
Showing this pawns's opinion towards others.
Green = friend
Red = rival
Pink = lover
LanguageData.OwlBar.RelationshipViewAlt.Tooltip:
Showing other's opinion towards this pawn.
Green = friend
Red = rival
Pink = lover
LanguageData.OwlBar.GoodMoodAltMode.Desc: Normally, if a pawn's mood is fine, there is no mood coloration. Enable this if you'd like good moods to be green instead.
LanguageData.OwlBar.CompatMode.Desc: Invokes the vanilla colonist bar method to try and allow other mods to do their thing, if possible. Disable to improve performance, or if not needed.
LanguageData.OwlBar.DrawWeaponsBelow.Desc: Draws the weapon below the portrait, as opposed to drawing it on the portrait itself.
